an4.80:1.1: At one time the Buddha was staying near Kosambī, in Ghosita’s Monastery.
an4.80:1.2: Then Venerable Ānanda went up to the Buddha, bowed, sat down to one side, and said to him:
an4.80:2.1: “Sir, what is the cause, what is the reason why females don’t attend council meetings, work for a living, or travel to Persia?”
an4.80:2.6: This is the cause, this is the reason why females don’t attend council meetings, work for a living, or travel to Persia.”
